text: Norman Otto Wagner, Jr. (February 5, 1912 – April 22, 1998) was an American professional basketball player. He played in the National Basketball League for three different teams during the 1937–38 season, including the Dayton Metropolitans, Columbus Athletic Supply, and Cincinnati Comellos. In eight career games he averaged 4.3 points per game. ==References== Category:1912 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Missouri Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Cincinnati Comellos players Category:Columbus Athletic Supply players Category:Dayton Metropolitans players Category:Missouri Tigers baseball players Category:Missouri Tigers men's basketball players Category:Sportspeople from St. Louis
title: Norm Wagner
